turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I need a coffee from Peet's. Hi, I need a coffee from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Dark roast.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what size would you like your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like coconut.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. would you like whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but I would like some vanilla flavoring.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, adding vanilla flavoring.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's all. The store on Sunrise Boulevard in Roseville.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so a large dark roast, coconut milk and vanilla flavoring. is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your coffee will be ready to be picked up at peet's coffee at sunrise boulevard and roseville in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you will receive the receipt through text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your coffee, byebye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
